head.title: Clayton County Public Schools - CCPS

meta.name: description
meta.content: The 5th largest school distict in Georgia committed to serving over 50,000 diverse students just south of metro Atlanta.

div.span:
2020 Clayton County Public Schools
Clayton County Public Schools (CCPS) does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in employment, admission to its programs,
services, or activities, access to any of the above, treatment of individuals, or any aspect of its operations.
View the 504 Child Find Statement here. Powered by Presence.
